Package core_components

Contains the core components of the application. These are swing components extended and customized for the application.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DrawIconButton
    Draw Icon button for drawing different shapes on the drawing panel.
    The created buttons are further added to the MainFrame's drawing button group which handles the behaviors related to the drawing of shapes on the panel.
    DrawingJPanel
    Panel for drawing items.
    GeometryIcon
    This class is an extension of the swing JPanel component.
    TableOfContents
    Arranges the list of current layers
    It can:
    Turn off and on layer
    Remove layer and
    Change the color of a layer.
    ToolIconButton
    Blue print for the tool buttons
    Uses background image and can change background dynamically
    Responds to mouse over and mouse exited by changing the background of the button
